str2: When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To raise up, set up; I rise from among (the) dead; I arise, appear. From ana and histemi; to stand up.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To marry, used of either sex. From gamos; to wed.
And not, neither, nor. From ou and te; not too, i.e. Neither or nor; by analogy, not even.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To give in marriage. From gamos; to espouse.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.
